awd_titl_txt: Designing Mathematics Learning Environments That Support    Investigations
awd_abstract_narration: This Small Business Innovation Research (SBIR) Phase I project                  has as its objective the design of a multimedia mathematics                     learning environment for grades K-8.  The software system                       envisioned would be complementary to a new math textbook series                 from Addison-Wesley that follows the new National Council of                    Teachers of Mathematics (NCTM) math standards for the reform of                 mathematics teaching and learning.  The software would provide                  interactive simulations embedded in problem-solving and open-                   ended exploratory contexts and would enable the encouragement of                theme-based projects, investigations, and hands-on mathematics.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Technology, Innovation, and Partnerships
